name: Shuriken (JWest)
description:
An alt-ctrl mini-game for your mouse!  Using your unlimited supply of throwing stars, see how long you can last against the onslaught!

 * Best Experienced with a wireless mouse and a pair of black gloves *

Instructions:
  • Holding your mouse in your right hand, turn it 90 degrees to the left and hold it over your left palm.
  • Throw a star by doing a flicking motion across your palm.
  • Press ESC to pause.
Credits and Attributions:
  • Pixel Art: Rebekah West
  • Music:  "Sanctuary" from the album 3 Red Hearts by Tallbeard Studios
  • Title Font: "Harmonic" by monkopus
  • Button/Instruction Font: "m5x7" by Daniel Linssen
Additional Tools Used:
  • MouseLock & PointerLock by YellowAfterlife
  • Bfxr
